archimate:Requirement.name: Ensure business owner who has e2e resonsibility for VA service
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As the TEMA Business Owner I need to ensure that Vulnerability Scanning service has a clearly designated owner who is responsible for: * Deploying the component in a safe manner (design, hardening) * The ongoing use of the component (security event monitoring) * Keeping the component supported (not reaching end-of-life) * The timely deployment of security patches when they become available, including the verification after they are deployed * Having an apparatus ready to implement mitigating controls should a zero-day vulnerability arise This is to ensure that the service is maintained, updated and operated according to the security baseline and best practices.
